casebody.data:
The COMMITTEE TO ELECT DAN FOREST
v.
EMPLOYEES POLITICAL ACTION COMMITTEE (EMPAC) 231A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 4, 2019 David Steven Walker, II, Attorney at Law, for The Committee to Elect Dan Forest C. Amanda Martin, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Employees Political Action Committee (EMPAC)

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of January 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of January 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 21st day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
